quote: Blessed is the person who is too busy to worry in the daytime, and too sleepy to worry at night.
A business absolutely devoted to service will have only one worry about profits. They will be embarrassingly large.
As a rule, men worry more about what they can't see than about what they can.
Do not anticipate trouble, or worry about what may never happen. Keep in the sunlight.
Do not worry about avoiding temptation. As you grow older it will avoid you.
Do not worry about holding high position; worry rather about playing your proper role.
Do not worry about your difficulties in Mathematics. I can assure you mine are still greater.
Don't worry about the world coming to an end today. It's already tomorrow in Australia.
Don't worry about your heart, it will last you as long as you live.
Don't worry when you are not recognized, but strive to be worthy of recognition.
Farmers only worry during the growing season, but towns people worry all the time.

I don't worry about terrorism. I was married for two years.
I have learned not to worry about love; but to honor its coming with all my heart.
I have lost everything, and I am so poor now that I really cannot afford to let anything worry me.
I never worry about action, but only inaction.
I never worry about action, but only inaction.
If you are doing your best, you will not have to worry about failure.
If you have enough push, you don't have to worry about the pull.
If you're doing your best, you won't have any time to worry about failure.
It's not morbid to talk about death. Most people don't worry about death, they worry about a bad death.
Iâ€™ve learned to accept birth and death . . . but sometimes I still worry about what lies between.
My dad used to say, 'You wouldn't worry so much about what people thought about you if you knew how seldom they did.'
One problem I have definitely solved is the problem of not having enough to worry about.
Our fatigue is often caused not by work, but by worry, frustration and resentment.
Sometimes I worry about being a success in a mediocre world.
The freedom now desired by many is not freedom to do and dare but freedom from care and worry.
The more technique you have, the less you have to worry about it. The more technique there is, the less there is.
The only thing wealth does for some people is to make them worry about losing it.
The only way I'd worry about the weather is if it snows on our side of the field and not theirs.
The reason why worry kills more people than work is that more people worry than work.
The sovereign cure for worry is prayer.
We need not worry so much about what man descends from; it's what he descends to that shames the human race.
We probably wouldn't worry about what people think of us if we could know how seldom they do.
Within certain limits, it is actually true that the less money you have, the less you worry.
Worry does not empty tomorrow of its sorrow; it empties today of its strength.
Worry is a cycle of inefficient thoughts whirling around a center of fear.
Worry is a useless mulling over of things we cannot change.
Worry is interest paid on trouble before it falls due.
Worry is the interest paid by those who borrow trouble.
Worry is the stomach's worst poison.
Worry not that no one knows of you; seek to be worth knowing.
You probably wouldn't worry about what people think of you if you could know how seldom they do.
